name: Chess Attack Mobile
description:
CHESS ATTACK is a single-player, endless reimagining of chess. Play as the king and attempt to capture as many enemy pieces as you can. Pieces enter the board from the edges and increase in frequency as you capture them. Can you top the leaderboards and become a CHESS ATTACK master?

FEATURES:
- Endless chess gameplay
- Speed chess mode
- Cross-platform leaderboards
- NO ADS
- It's FREE
